newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-ROCHE PULLS OUT OF FRANCE-TURKEY MATCH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ROCHE PULLS OUT OF FRANCE-TURKEY MATCH.

text.p: France libero Alain Roche on Monday pulled out of Wednesday's soccer friendly against Turkey because of a painful ankle.
"I must wait for the pain to end. It's been a lingering problem but the pain was getting unbearable," he said.
Roche had to be replaced in Paris St Germain's 2-0 league win over Le Havre on Saturday because of the injury.
Doctors said Roche was suffering from the same injury which required surgery six years ago when he played for Marseille.
